moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by two when the user is in a pinch.

passives.name: Healing Hail 1
passives.description: Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action during a hailstorm.
